featureNames.item: No age restriction on terminal illness cover.
Suicide/self inflicted injury benefit for first 13 months.
No events excluded from cover for events other than suicide/self inflicted injury.
Guaranteed first year rates on stepped premiums.
HIV/AIDS or needle-stick cover available for medical professionals.
TPD cover available for 'home duties' occupation.
Cover continues to at least age 60 without definition changes.
Cover continues to at least age 65 without definition changes.
Deferred buy back of TPD cover available.
Immediate buy back of TPD cover available.
Full benefit paid for cancer (malignant tumour).
Full benefit paid for metastatic cancer.
Full benefit paid for blood or bone marrow based cancers.
Full benefit paid for breast cancer (involving mastectomy).
Full benefit paid for prostate cancer (involving removal or high cancer classification/score).
Partial benefit for prostate cancer (low cancer classification/score).
Partial benefit paid for carcinoma-in-situ of the breast.
Heart Attack - Full payment for aorta surgery.
Heart Attack - Full payment for valve surgery.
Full benefit paid for stroke (causing neurological damage).
Minimum surival period from diagnosis less than 28 days for full benefit.
At least 25% benefit paid for angioplasty.
Medically and occupationally acquired Hepatitis C.
Immediate buy back of death cover.
Deferred buy back of death cover.
Stepped premium rates guaranteed for more than 1 year.
Cover continues after 12 months of unemployment.
Total disablement definition based on performing any occupation, suitable by education, training or experience.
Total disablement definition does not change after 12month period of unemployment.
Loss of income' definition for partial disablement.
Duties based' definition for partial disablement.
Hourly based' definition for partial disablement.
Rehabilitation program benefit is at least 6 times monthly benefit.
Rehabilitation expense benefit at least 6 times monthly benefit.
Premium refund if full benefit not paid.
No offset applied for lump sum income sources.
Increasing claim benefit is not limited.
Act-of-war or armed forces service cover.
Elective surgery cover in first 6 months.
Carer accommodation benefit available (>100km from home).
Benefit paid to immediate family member who provides full time care.
Benefit provided for relocation to Australia.
Full benefit term for worldwide cover.
Premium for other benefits waived while on claim.
Premium waived while pregnant or maternity leave (up to 3 months).
Premium waived during unemployment (up to 3 months).
Extension cover for those over 65 years old.
Full monthly benefit amount available for incomes over $300,000.
HIV/AIDS or needle-stick income benefit cover available for medical professionals.
HIV/AIDS or needle-stick lump sum benefit available for medical professionals.
Premium discount available for HIV/AIDS exclusion.
Premium discount available for reduced benefit for mental disability.
Premium discount available for reduced occupation risk cover.
Permanent disability lump sum cover available.
Lump sum benefit guaranteed tax free.
